div.head: THE POST OFFICE BAN
div.p: THE WOMAN REBEL FEELS PROUD THE POST OFFICE AUTHORITIES DID NOT APPROVE OF HER.
SHE SHALL BLUSH WITH SHAME IF EVER SHE BE APPROVED OF BY OFFICIALISM OR "COMSTOCKISM."

div.head: A WOMAN'S DUTY
div.p: TO BREED LARGE FAMILIES--IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 211 OF THE CRIMINAL CODE AS AMENDED BY THE ACT OF MARCH 4, 1911
